ReportText: CHEST RADIOGRAPH: PA and Lateral views HISTORY: R05 Cough R06.2 Wheezing J40 Bronchitis [DATE].0 Bronchopneumonia COMPARISON: none. LUNGS: The lung fields demonstrate normal degree of inflation. There is no evidence of pneumonia. The pulmonary interstitial markings are normal. There are no suspicious pulmonary nodules. There are no pleural effusions. Costophrenic sulci are sharp. MEDIASTINUM: The trachea is midline with no evidence of extrinsic compression. There is no evidence of hilar enlargement. The thoracic aorta outlines normally. The cardiac size is normal. There is no cardiac pacemaker. There are no surgical wires nor clips. The diaphragm is smooth. BONES: The thoracic spine demonstrates no significant degenerative changes. Thoracic curvature is normal. IMPRESSION: Normal chest radiograph
